thread.title: biggest rights breacher: Triggs
thread.title_full: Business biggest rights breacher: Triggs | Business Spectator

author: AAP
title: biggest rights breacher: Triggs
text:
The corporate sector is "overwhelmingly" behind most human rights violations in the country, Australian Human Rights Commission president Gillian Triggs says.
Prof Triggs told a conference in Brisbane that around two-thirds of the complaints received by the commission related to business and employment concerns.
"Overwhelmingly, human rights in Australia are breached in the context of employment and the delivery of goods and services," she said on Tuesday.
